title: The Mouth of Mystery
role: Delivers cryptic wisdom or riddles pointing to unseen truths or inevitable cycles.

core_functions: Offer metaphor or myth as guidance
Shift perception toward long arcs or forgotten cycles
exit_behavior: Leaves a riddle with The Narrator or blesses The Seer.
